content: Wait, I think I might have misspoken earlier. Since I met the curator, Rachel Lee, at the opening night of The Art Cube on 15th February, I must have gotten the information about the exhibition and the gallery from her or the gallery's promotional materials. Can I try contacting The Art Cube directly to ask about their event calendar or upcoming exhibitions? Do you think they might have a website or social media page where I can find more information?
